component.text: Network and Host Portions of an IP Address
These values are in the network portion of the address. They can be "0" or "1".
These values are in the host portion of the address. They can be "0" or "1".
A "1" in these positions indicates that these positions are part of the network portion of the address.
A "0" in these positions indicates that these positions are part of the host portion of the address.
